events.comment: Button Press - New Game, Exit, and fullscreen
Audio - Play looped music at the start of a main menu scene
Camera - Make camera centered on the player and moving on a scene
Monster - Simple enemy AI, with X axis movements
Door - Represents an ending of a level
Pause - You can pause a level scene at any time
Fullscreen - Show a scene in fullscreen
Audio - Play looped music at the start of a level scene
Save and Load - You can save and load the game at any time
Boss fight - Boss is moving in both, X and Y axis
Button Press - Back, Restart, and Exit game
Fullscreen - Show a scene in fullscreen
Audio - Play looped music at the start of a main menu scene
Button Press, Fullscreen, and Audio - Congrats. You have passed the level 1
